Book.Title: Java 2 Exam Cram
Book.Author: Bill Brogden
Book.Topic: Certified Programmer for the Java 2 Platform
Book.BriefDescription: This compact study guide concentrates on the topics covered in Sun's Java 2 programmer certification exam. Numerous questions similar to those on the real exam are presented and discussed.

Book.Title: HTML 4 For Dummies
Book.Author: Natanya Pitts
Ed Tittel
Book.BriefDescription: The fifth edition of this introductory book about the Hypertext Markup Language, the markup used to build documents for use on the Web. This book covers elements of page design, comprehensive markup definitions and examples, and includes a CD with examples taken from the text, along with a set of Web pages, templates, and online resources built specifically for the book's readers.
